solution_line_template: If each serving size is {serving_size_capsules} capsules, a {capsules_per_bottle}-capsule bottle of vitamin D3 would contain {capsules_per_bottle}/{serving_size_capsules}=<<{capsules_per_bottle}/{serving_size_capsules}={servings_per_bottle}>>{servings_per_bottle} servings.

Using {servings_per_bottle}-serving bottles, to last {total_days} days, it would take {total_days}/{servings_per_bottle}=<<{total_days}/{servings_per_bottle}={bottles_needed}>>{bottles_needed} bottles of vitamin D3.
